description: Realme 15 Pro 5G's leaked render reveals a silver colourway, possibly the rumoured 'Flowing Silver' shade, with a dual rear camera setup. It is expected to include a 50-megapixel main sensor. The phone may have a flat display with very slim bezels, and a centred hole-punch front camera slot. The volume rocker and a protruding power button are on the left edge, suggesting an under-display fingerprint sensor.
title: Realme 15 Pro 5G Leaked Render Shows Design Ahead of India Launch

description: Samsung has launched the Smart Monitor M9 in India, and has refreshed the M8 and M7 models. The 32-inch Smart Monitor M9 with QD-OLED 4K glare-free display and a 165Hz refresh rate is priced at Rs. 1,25,999. The Smart Monitor M8 costs Rs. 49,299 for the 32-inch option, while the 32-inch and 43-inch Smart Monitor M7 models range from Rs. 30,699 to Rs. 34,299. Buyers can avail of discount coupons up to Rs. 3,000 valid till July 20 on the new Samsung Smart Monitor M9.
title: Samsung Smart Monitor M9 With QD-OLED Display Launched in India Alongside Refreshed M8, M7 Models

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra is still six months away from launch, but the latest rumours suggest that Samsung could have something new up its sleeve for next year's flagship. It is said to come with 16GB RAM and a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 2 chipset. Samsung is said to pack a new 12-megapixel telephoto sensor with 3x optical zoom in the phone.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra Said to Get 16GB RAM, Improved Telephoto Lens, More

description: The Unique Identification Authority of India (UIDAI) has released an updated list of documents which are accepted for enrollment of Aadhaar, under the Aadhaar (Enrolment and Update) First Amendment Regulations, 2025, and have come into effect July 2. To begin with, any document that has been uploaded as address proof, such as a voter ID or bank passbook, should be verifiable by UIDAI either digitally or via offline medium using online systems.
title: UIDAI Updates List of Valid Documents for Aadhaar Enrollment and Updation: How to Update Aadhaar Card Online

description: Xiaomi has launched its new Compact Power Bank with 20,000mAh battery, built-in cable, and 22.5W fast charging support. The company will sell the new power bank online through its official website and Flipkart. Xiaomi will offer the power bank in two colour options - Ivy Green and Dark grey.
title: Xiaomi Compact Power Bank 20,000mAh Launched in India With Built-In Cable: Price, Features

description: Amazon India announced the release of its Rufus artificial intelligence (AI) assistant in the desktop-based web interface on Monday. The e-commerce giant highlighted that the AI-powered shopping assistant will help users during the Prime Day sale between July 12-14 in making informed decisions. Notably, Rufus was first introduced in India in August 2024.
title: Amazon India Is Bringing Rufus AI Assistant to Desktop, to Help Users During Prime Day Sale 2025

description: The latest round of cuts at Microsoft has impacted the Forza Motorsport team and reportedly led to Ireland-based Romero Games being closed. Microsoft slashed four percent of its total workforce last week and cancelled several projects in development at multiple Xbox-owned studios.
title: Forza Motorsport Team 'No More', Romero Games 'Completely Closed' Following Microsoft Cuts

description: Ahead of its launch, a tipster has revealed key specifications of the rumoured Honor X70 on the Chinese microblogging platform Weibo. The smartphone is expected to feature an 8,300mAh battery with support for 80W fast charging. Honor is said to also offer the handset in multiple colours and storage options.
title: Honor X70 Tipped to Launch With an 8,300mAh Battery, Snapdragon 6 Gen 4 SoC

description: Amazon will sell the 128GB storage variant of the iPhone 15 for Rs. 57,249 (including bank offer) dyrubg the upcoming Prime Day sale, which starts July 12. The handset was launched in 2023 with an original price of Rs. 79,900. Amazon is offering up to Rs. 52,000 exchange discount as well.
title: iPhone 15 to Get a Discount During Amazon Prime Day 2025 Sale: Price Revealed

description: Nothing Headphone 1 ticks all the right boxes to be a great value proposition device. The design is nothing that you will find in the market, and the entire retro design thing will build on you very soon. The balanced sound output on the Headphone 1 is something that will be appreciated by many, and those who love to tweak have access to equaliser settings. The battery life is also solid on this device. The 40mm drivers are suitable for the headphones, and the ANC is also decent.
title: Nothing Headphone 1 Review: Retro Cool, Balanced Sound

description: Realme 15 series will soon be launched in India. Ahead of the launch, the company has shared details about two new artificial intelligence (AI) features that users will get across the entire lineup. The first is a voice-based photo editing feature dubbed AI Edit Genie, and the second is the AI Party, which is a camera-based scene detection feature.
title: Realme 15 Series to Feature AI Edit Genie, a Voice-Enabled Photo Editing Tool

description: Amazon Prime Day sale 2025 will run from July 12 to 14 in India, while offering up to 40 percent discount on smartphones and accessories, along with up to 24 months no-cost EMI options and exchange offers worth up to Rs. 60,000. Ahead of the Prime Day sale, Amazon has revealed that the Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra will be available at a starting price of Rs. 74,999 for the 12GB + 256GB variant, down from its launch price of Rs. 1,29,999.
title: Amazon Prime Day Sale 2025: Samsung Galaxy S24 Ultra to Be Available Under Rs. 80,000

description: HP has introduced its new OmniBook 5 and OmniBook 3 series laptops in India. The OmniBook 5 features a 14-inch display and is powered by a Qualcomm Snapdragon X Plus processor. Meanwhile, the OmniBook 3 is available in 14-inch and 15.6-inch variants, running on AMD Ryzen AI 300 series processors.
title: HP OmniBook 5, OmniBook 3 Series With Latest AMD and Snapdragon Processors Launched in India

description: Samsung’s Galaxy Z Fold 7, as per the latest leaks and rumours, is said to get some substantial design upgrades this year, which may bring it on par with Chinese competitors. This device is getting a lot thinner even compared to the Galaxy Z Fold 6 launched last year. The device is expected to grow bigger as well but is said to retain the battery capacity of the previous model. Ahead of the upcoming launch, there’s news about a price hike for the Indian market.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 7 Tipped to Get a Noticeable Price Hike Over Galaxy Z Fold 6 in India

description: One UI 8 is expected to be released later this year as Samsung's iteration of the Android 16 operating system (OS). According to a tipster's claims on social media, the South Korean tech conglomerate could upgrade a notable Galaxy AI feature with additional capabilities. Audio Eraser, which lets the user remove unwanted or background noises from videos, may soon work in real-time, enabling the removal of audio without having to enter the editing mode.
title: Samsung May Upgrade AI-Powered Audio Eraser Feature in One UI 8 With Real-Time Editing Support

description: Telecom operators in India could reportedly increase mobile tariffs by the end of the ongoing year. As per the report, the increase in pricing could go as high as 10 to 12 percent, however, companies might take a tiered approach this year. The new approach will reportedly be taken as Indian telecom operators raised base prices by 11 to 23 percent in July 2024.
title: Telecom Operators Could Hike Mobile Tariff Again as Active Subscribers Saw Sharp Growth: Report

description: TikTok is building a new version of its app for users in the United States ahead of a planned sale of the app to a group of investors, The Information reported on Sunday, citing unnamed sources.
title: TikTok Building New Version of App Ahead of Expected US Sale: Report

description: Microsoft-owned Arkane Studios founder has called Xbox Game Pass "unsustainable" following a wave of layoffs last week that hit the Xbox division hard. Game Pass offers subscribers several new games, including all first-party Microsoft games, at launch for no additional cost.
title: Arkane Studios Founder Calls Game Pass 'Unsustainable' After Xbox Layoffs

description: The Infinix Hot 60 5G+ is set to launch in India on July 11 via Flipkart. It will be sold in Shadow Blue, Sleek Black, and Tundra Green shades. It will come with a MediaTek Dimensity 7020 SoC with support for up to 12GB LPDDR5x RAM and 90fps gaming. The handset will be equipped with a custom One Tap AI Button, support for Google's Circle to Search, and AI features like Folax AI assistant.
title: Infinix Hot 60 5G+ India Launch Date Set for July 11; to Get a Custom One Tap AI Button

description: While we await the official launch of the iPhone 17 series, a fresh render has surfaced, suggesting the possible rear design of the Pro models. It showcases a repositioned Apple logo and a redesigned MagSafe magnet array. The phones appear to feature a larger, elongated camera island housing three rear sensors.
title: iPhone 17 Pro, iPhone 17 Pro Max Leaked Render Shows Repositioned Apple Logo, New MagSafe Design

description: Following its critical success in cinemas and an impressive IMDb rating of 8.9, Karki is set to capture wider audiences with its digital debut. The film has been praised for its powerful performances, especially by Jai Prakash Reddy and Meenakshi Dinesh.
title: Karki OTT Release Date: When and Where to Watch it Online?

description: OpenAI has generally been tight-lipped about the next-generation of its frontier artificial intelligence (AI) model, GPT-5. However, the company has recently shared some hints at what users can expect once the model is available. An OpenAI executive has claimed that the GPT-5 large language model (LLM) could witness the merger of the GPT and o-series models.
title: OpenAI Plans to Unify Capabilities From Its GPT and O Series With the Release of GPT-5 AI Model

description: Samsung is expected to launch the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7 on July 9, during its Galaxy Unpacked event. Right before the event, the global variant of the Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE has been spotted on the Geekbench benchmarking website with an Exynos 2400 chipset and 8GB RAM. The smartphone is reportedly expected to launch alongside the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7.
title: Samsung Galaxy Z Flip 7 FE Global Variant Spotted on Geekbench With An Exynos 2400 SoC

description: Thammudu made a strong impression on audiences even before its release with its intense trailer and emotionally layered premise. Though the title may bring to mind the classic film of a similar name, this version tells a completely different story, focusing on how one night changes everything for a family.
title: Thammudu Explores an Emotional Night of Conflict, Courage, and Family Ties

description: Xiaomi’s long-standing partnership with Leica Camera could soon be coming to an end, according to claims by a tipster on social media. Since 2022, the China-based OEM and the German camera and lens manufacturer have collaborated to develop mobile imaging solutions for Xiaomi smartphones, seen in models like the Xiaomi 15 series. However, this is said to be phased out soon in order to cut down on licensing fee costs and prioritise its proprietary camera technology.
title: Xiaomi 16 Series Could Drop Leica Branding to Prioritise Proprietary Camera Technology

description: Gajarama is a Kannada Action film that revolves around a young wrestler whose childhood crush gets engaged, which leaves him heartbroken. However, things turn upside down, when he encounters her and learns his fiance is involved into dangerous act. This blend of love and competition is a must watch.
title: Gajarama OTT Release: Know When and Where to Watch it Online

description: The Honor X9c 5G is equipped with the Snapdragon 6 Gen 1 chipset and a 6,600mAh battery with 66W wired fast charging. It features a 6.78-inch 1.5K curved AMOLED display with multiple TÜV eye protection certifications. The phone ships with MagicOS 9.0 and supports AI features like Motion Sensing and Deepfake Detection. It has a 108-megapixel OIS-backed dual rear camera unit and a 16-megapixel selfie snapper.
title: Honor X9c 5G Launched in India With 6,600mAh Battery, IP65M Rating: Price, Specifications

description: Smartphone batteries degrade and lose capacity over time, and a battery replacement eventually becomes necessary. Battery health monitoring is a feature that is now available on select Google Pixel phones with the Android 16 update. Many third-party Android manufacturers have also enabled this convenient feature, allowing users to monitor their phone's battery health directly through the Settings app.
title: How to Check Battery Health on Android Smartphones

description: BSNL recently launched its 5G services in India, under the banner of Q-5G (short for Quantum 5G). The state-owned telecom operator is now offering subscribers a complimentary upgrade to its 4G/ 5G SIM card. They can upgrade from an existing BSNL 2G/ 3G SIM card by visiting a BSNL CSC or authorised retailer and take advantage of high-speed internet, currently available in select Indian circles.
title: How to Upgrade to BSNL 4G/ 5G SIM Card Online: A Step-by-Step Guide

description: The Itel City 100, priced at Rs. 7,599, is currently available in India in offline stores with a complimentary magnetic speaker. The phone features a 6.75-inch 90Hz HD+ display, a Unisoc T7250 chipset paired with 4GB of RAM, a 13-megapixel rear and 8-megapixel front camera. It is equipped with several AI features like Aivana 3.0, and tools to support image-to-text conversion and document editing. It packs a 5,200mAh battery with 18W charging and has an IP64-rated build.
title: Itel City 100 Launched in India With 5,200mAh Battery, IP64 Rating: Price, Specifications

description: Jagamerigina Satyam is a Telugu romance thriller movie, which has been written and directed by Tirupathi Pale. The movie is set in 1994, where a young farmer’s son named Satyam, fall in love with Sarpanch’s niece, Saritha. Their love sparks controversy, jealousy, betrayal, and murder. Watch now.
title: Jagamerigina Satyam Now Available for Streaming on SunNXT: Everything You Need to Know About Plot, Cast, Crew, and more

description: Lava Blaze AMOLED 5G has been listed on the company's India website, revealing the phone's specifications and colourways. It is listed in Starlight Purple and Titanium Grey colour options with a 6.67-inch display. It is equipped with a MediaTek Dimensity 6300 chipset and features a dual rear camera unit.
title: Lava Blaze AMOLED 5G Listed Online With MediaTek Dimensity 6300 SoC, 5,000mAh Battery

description: Lumio Arc 5 and Lumio Arc 7 projectors were launched in India on Monday. The projectors arrive with up to 100 inches of screen size support and certification from Google TV and Netflix. The company claims the devices support all the major OTT platforms. The Arc 5 has a light output of 200 ANSI lumens, while the Arc 7 has a maximum brightness of 400 ANSI lumens.
title: Lumio Arc 5, Arc 7 Projectors Launched in India With Official Support for Netflix and Google TV

description: Samsung is rumoured to unveil the Galaxy Watch 8 series as well as the successor to 2024’s Watch Ultra soon. Ahead of their anticipated debut during this year’s Galaxy Unpacked, complete specifications of all upcoming smartwatches have surfaced. As per a report, the Galaxy Watch 8, Watch 8 Classic, and the Watch Ultra 2 will be powered by a 3nm Samsung Exynos chipset, running on Wear OS 6.
title: Samsung Galaxy Watch 8 Series, Watch Ultra 2 Specifications Leak Ahead of Galaxy Unpacked

description: With Paramasivan Fathima, aha Tamil delivers a daring thriller that goes beyond entertainment. The film takes a powerful stance on religious extremism, identity politics, and rural power structures. Esakki Karvannan’s direction brings intensity and realism to every frame, supported by grounded performances and sharp dialogue.
title: Paramasivan Fathima Is Now Streaming on Aha Tamil: What You Need to Know

description: The Noise Buds F1 offer Bluetooth 5.3 connectivity and support the SBC audio codec. These TWS earphones are equipped with 11mm drivers and fairly accurate touch sensors. They are claimed to offer a battery life of up to 50 hours, together with the case. Along with a long battery life, these headsets promise a big sound, at a surprisingly low price, but do they deliver?
title: Noise Buds F1 Review: Best TWS Under Rs. 1,200?
